themes: prioritization of artistic merit over recipient identity
perceived overemphasis on identity factors in funding
critique of current grant evaluation criteria
key_phrases: funds rewarded more on the basis of content, quality, and value to the community
less on the identity of the recipient
over emphasis on skin color or identity of grant recipients
sacrificing artistic merit and value to the community at large
barriers_identified: overemphasis on recipient identity in grant decisions
artistic merit and community value being deprioritized
solutions_proposed: reward funds more on the basis of content, quality, and value to the community
reduce emphasis on the identity of the recipient in funding decisions
